DataElement.preferredName: Patient Timed Up And Go Assessment Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The checkbox for information related to the Timed "Up and Go" assessment.  The assessment measures the time it takes for an individual to stand up from a standard arm chair, walk a distance of 3 meters, turn, walk back to the chair, and sit down again.  (Reference: Timed "Up and Go".  D. Podsiadio and S. Richardson, 1991)

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Timed Up And Go Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the Timed "Up and Go" assessment.  The assessment measures the time it takes for an individual to stand up from a standard arm chair, walk a distance of 3 meters, turn, walk back to the chair, and sit down again.  (Reference: Timed "Up and Go".  D. Podsiadio and S. Richardson, 1991)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
